Maskwacîs Cree Dictionary
{# these two entries have common analysis: pisin+V+AI+Imp+Imm+2Sg #} {# Their definition should NOT be merged, as inflected forms may have different definitions #}
pisin VAI-n pisin-
s/he gets something in his/her eye
pisiniw
-
He gets something stuck in his eye.
s/he gets something in his/her eye
